name: AdSignals
tag_list: advertising, email-marketing, monetization, audience, ads, online-advertising
overview:
Adsignals is a provider of innovative solutions and technologies for online advertising, direct email marketing and media monetization. AdSignals helps large publishers, local directory services and publisher networks segment and monetize their traffic.

AdSignals products leverage core proprietary advanced semantic, behavioral and profiling technology to provides a richer user experience and higher revenues to publishers. Products include AdSignals Direct, the one-stop-shop direct email marketing monetization and optimization solution for publishers and communities, AdSignals Display, the display and performance ad network for bloggers and independent publishers, AdSignals Audience, the white-label audience network platform for large publishers and aggregators and AdSignals Leads, the end-to-end solution for local lead generation advertising.
